trans-unit.source: Represents a Workflow role that is backed by a <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função de fluxo de trabalho que é copiada por um <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For more information about roles in ASP.NET, see [Role Providers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Para obter mais informações sobre as funções no ASP.NET, consulte [fornecedores de função](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> class by using the specified role name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref> classe utilizando o nome de função especificada.

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que define o nome da função.

trans-unit.source: roleName contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: roleNamecontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> class by using the specified role name and role provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref> classe com o nome de função especificado e o fornecedor de funções.

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: O utilizados mais frequentemente fornecedores de função para <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>são as classes que herdam <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Estas classes incluem <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que define o nome da função.

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the role provider.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que define o fornecedor de funções.

trans-unit.source: roleName contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: roleNamecontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of ASP.NET accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma lista de contas do ASP.NET genérica associadas a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> supports only <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>suporta apenas <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, it supports these methods only for the user account that is currently the WindowsPrincipal associated with the request context, so you cannot call <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> for any user account in the domain.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, que suporta estes métodos apenas para a conta de utilizador que está atualmente a WindowsPrincipal associadas com o contexto do pedido, pelo que não é possível chamar <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>para qualquer conta de utilizador no domínio.</xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the GetIdentities method with the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, the following provider exception is thrown: The configured Role Provider (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) relies upon Windows authentication to determine the groups that the user is allowed to be a member of.
trans-unit.target: Ao utilizar o método GetIdentities com o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, é emitida a seguinte exceção do fornecedor: O fornecedor de função configurado (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) baseia-se na autenticação do Windows para determinar os grupos que o utilizador tem permissão para ser um membro do.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Role Manager cannot be used to manage Windows users and groups.
trans-unit.target: Gestor de funções ASP.NET não pode ser utilizado para gerir grupos e utilizadores do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Use the SQLRoleProvider if you want to support custom user/role assignment.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o SQLRoleProvider se pretende suportar a atribuição de função/utilizador personalizada.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of string values that represent the ASP.NET accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de valores de cadeia que representam as contas ASP.NET genérica associadas a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> contains the specified identity
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref> contém a identidade especificada

trans-unit.source: The name of the identity to test for.
trans-unit.target: O nome da identidade para testar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref> contains the specified identity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref> contém a identidade especificada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Name was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O nome foi definido para uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role provider for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o fornecedor de funções para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: O utilizados mais frequentemente fornecedores de função para <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>são as classes que herdam <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole>

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Estas classes incluem <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider>e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the role provider for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o fornecedor de função para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole"> </xref>.
